source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT a.[Id], a.[PostcodeId], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[LastUpdated],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[AddressDetail] a

SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name], a.[ShortName], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[PostCode],a.Latitude, a.Longitude, a.Instructions,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Location] a

SELECT a.[Id],a.[Postcode],a.[LastUpdated],a.[Latitude],a.[Longitude],a.[FriendlyName],a.[IsActive],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM [Address].[Postcode] a
SELECT a.[Id],a.[Postcode],a.CompressedNearestPostcodes,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM [Address].[PreComputedNearestPostcodes] a
SELECT a.[SupportActivityId], a.[AutoSignUpWhenOtherSelected],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Configuration].[SupportActivity] a

SELECT a.[ID],a.[FeedbackDate],a.[JobId],a.[UserId],a.[RequestRoleTypeID],a.[FeedbackRatingTypeID],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM [Feedback].[Feedback] a
select r.GroupID, r.ActivityID, r.CredentialSetID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet] r
select r.ID, r.Name, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Credential] r
select r.ID, r.GroupID,r.CredentialID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[CredentialSet] r
select r.ID, r.GroupName, r.ParentGroupId, r.GroupKey, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Group] r

select r.GroupID, r.CredentialID, r.CredentialTypeID,r.Name, r.HowToAchieve, r.DisplayOrder, r.CredentialVerifiedByID, r.HowToAchieve_CTA_Destination, r.WhatIsThis, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupCredential] r
select r.GroupID, r.[Configuration], r.CommunicationJobTypeID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupEmailConfiguration] r
select r.GroupID, r.LocationID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupLocation] r
select r.GroupID, r.[MapLocationID], r.Latitude, r.Longitude, r.ZoomLevel, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupMapDetails] r

select r.GroupID, r.SupportActivityID, r.SupportActivityInstructionsID, r.Radius, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupSupportActivityConfiguration] r

select r.GroupID, r.NewRequestNotificationStrategyId, 
r.MaxVolunteer, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] r

select r.GroupID, r.[FirstName], r.[LastName], r.[AddressLine1], r.[AddressLine2], r.[AddressLine3], r.[Locality], r.[Postcode], r.[EmailAddress], r.[MobilePhone], r.[OtherPhone], 
CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[RequestorDetails] r
select r.GroupID, r.AllowAutonomousJoinersAndLeavers,  CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SecurityConfiguration] r
select r.SupportActivityInstructionsID, r.Instructions, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SupportActivityInstructions] r

select r.GroupID, r.UserID, r.CredentialID, r.DateAdded, r.ValidUntil, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.Reference, r.Notes,  CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserCredential] r
select r.UserID, r.RoleID, r.GroupId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRole] r

select r.Id, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.UserID, r.GroupId, r.RoleId, r.DateRequested,r.ActionID,r.Success, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRoleAudit] r
select r.GroupID, r.Source, r.RegistrationFormVariant, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RegistrationJourney] r
select r.GroupID, r.Source, r.RequestHelpFormVariant, r.TargetGroups,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RequestHelpJourney] r
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[CommunicationJobType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[CredentialTypes] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[DueDateType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Frequency] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[GroupType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[JobStatus] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Location] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Question] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[QuestionType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RegistrationFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestEvent] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormStage] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestHelpFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestRoles] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestorType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Role] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivity] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivityInstructions] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[TargetGroup] a

select r.ID, r.RequestId, r.SupportActivityID, r.Details, r.DueDate, r.IsHealthCritical, r.JobStatusID, r.VolunteerUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Job] r
select r.JobID, r.GroupID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r
select r.JobID, r.QuestionID, r.Answer, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobQuestions] r

select r.JobID, r.JobStatusID, r.DateCreated, r.VolunteerUserID, r.CreatedByUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[RequestJobStatus] r
select r.RequestId, r.DateRequested, r.RequestEventId, r.JobId, r.UserId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[LogRequestEvent] r
select r.ActivityID, r.QuestionID, r.[Order], CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions] r
select r.ID, r.[Name], r.QuestionType, r.[Required],r.AdditionalData, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[Question] r

select r.ID, r.PostCode, r.DateRequested, r.IsFulfillable,r.CommunicationSent,r.ForRequestor,r.OtherDetails,r.PersonID_Recipient,r.PersonID_Requester,r.ReadPrivacyNotice,r.AcceptedTerms,r.SpecialCommunicationNeeds,r.CreatedByUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Request] r

select r.ID,  r.RequestorType,r.OrganisationName
from [Request].[Request] r 
where RequestorType is not null or OrganisationName is not null
select r.RequestId,r.StartDate, r.ShiftLength, r.LocationId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Shift] r

select r.RequestId, r.FreqencyID, r.NumberOfRepeats, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Request].[RequestSubmission] r
select r.RequestId, r.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r

select r.RequestId, r.JobId, r.DateCreated, r.FieldChanged,r.CreatedByUserID,r.OldValue,r.NewValue,r.QuestionId,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[UpdateHistory] r
select u.UserID,u.PostalCode, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[ChampionPostcode] u
select u.UserID,u.RegistrationStep,u.DateCompleted, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[RegistrationHistory] u
select u.UserID,u.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[SupportActivity] u

select u.ID, u.FirebaseUID, u.PostalCode, u.EmailSharingConsent, u.MobileSharingConsent, u.OtherPhoneSharingConsent, u.HMSContactConsent, u.IsVolunteer, u.IsVerified, u.DateCreated, u.StreetChampionRoleUnderstood, u.SupportVolunteersByPhone, u.SupportRadiusMiles, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[User] u

SELECT a.[RequestHelpFormVariantID], a.[SupportActivityID],a.[Label], a.[DisplayOrder], a.[IsPreSelected], CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Website].[RegistrationFormSupportActivity] a

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[PostcodeId], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[LastUpdated] , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[AddressDetail] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[AddressDetail], @{activity('Last_AddressDetail').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('CurrentChange_AddressDetail').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[PostcodeId], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[LastUpdated] , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[AddressDetail] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[AddressDetail], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], a.[ShortName], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[PostCode],a.Latitude, a.Longitude, a.Instructions , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Location] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[Location], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Postcode],a.[LastUpdated],a.[Latitude],a.[Longitude],a.[FriendlyName],a.[IsActive], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Postcode] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[PostCode], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Postcode],a.CompressedNearestPostcodes, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[PreComputedNearestPostcodes] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[PreComputedNearestPostcodes], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value: SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT IS_DEFINED(c.RecipientUserID) ? c.RecipientUserID : c.RecipientUserId AS RecipientUserID, c.MessageId, c.GroupId, c.JobId, c.TemplateName,c.event,udf.convertTime(c._ts) as EventTime, IS_DEFINED(c.RequestId) ? c.RequestId : -1 as RequestId FROM c where c.TemplateName<>null and 
c.event<>null

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.SupportActivityID, a.[AutoSignUpWhenOtherSelected], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Configuration].[SupportActivity] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Configuration].[SupportActivity], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.SupportActivityID = CT.SupportActivityID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[FeedbackDate], a.[JobId],a.[UserId], a.[RequestRoleTypeID],a.[FeedbackRatingTypeID], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Feedback].[Feedback] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Feedback].[Feedback], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.ActivityID, CT.CredentialSetID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID  and r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID and r.CredentialSetID = CT.CredentialSetID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.Name, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Credential] 
r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[Credential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.ID = CT.ID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, CT.GroupID, CT.CredentialID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[CredentialSet] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[CredentialSet], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID  and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.GroupName, r.ParentGroupId, r.GroupKey, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Group] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[Group], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.CredentialID, r.CredentialTypeID,r.Name, r.HowToAchieve, r.DisplayOrder, r.CredentialVerifiedByID, r.HowToAchieve_CTA_Destination, r.WhatIsThis,  CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupCredential] 
r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupCredential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, r.Configuration, CT.CommunicationJobTypeID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
from [Group].[GroupEmailConfiguration] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN 
CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupEmailConfiguration], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.CommunicationJobTypeID = CT.CommunicationJobTypeID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.LocationID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupLocation] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupLocation], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.LocationID = CT.LocationID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.MapLocationID, r.Latitude, r.Longitude, r.ZoomLevel, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
from [Group].[GroupMapDetails] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN 
CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupMapDetails], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.MapLocationID = CT.MapLocationID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.SupportActivityID, r.SupportActivityInstructionsID, r.Radius, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[GroupSupportActivityConfiguration] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN 
CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupSupportActivityConfiguration], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) 
as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.SupportActivityID = CT.SupportActivityID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, r.NewRequestNotificationStrategyId, r.MaxVolunteer, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, r.[FirstName], r.[LastName], r.[AddressLine1], r.[AddressLine2], r.[AddressLine3], r.[Locality], r.[Postcode], r.[EmailAddress], r.[MobilePhone], r.[OtherPhone], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
from [Group].[RequestorDetails] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN 
CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[RequestorDetails], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, r.AllowAutonomousJoinersAndLeavers, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[SecurityConfiguration] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[SecurityConfiguration], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.SupportActivityInstructionsID, r.Instructions, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SupportActivityInstructions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[SupportActivityInstructions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.SupportActivityInstructionsID= CT.SupportActivityInstructionsID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.UserID, CT.CredentialID, CT.DateAdded,r.ValidUntil, r.[AuthorisedByUserID], r.Reference, r.Notes , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[UserCredential] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[UserCredential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID  and r.UserID = CT.UserID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID and r.DateAdded = CT.DateAdded
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.RoleID, CT.GroupID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRole] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[UserRole], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.UserID = CT.UserID and r.RoleID = CT.RoleID and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.AuthorisedByUserID, r.UserID,r.GroupID, r.RoleID, r.DateRequested,r.ActionID,r.Success , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[UserRoleAudit] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[UserRoleAudit], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.Source,r.[RegistrationFormVariant], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RegistrationJourney] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Website].[RegistrationJourney], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.[Source] = CT.[Source] where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.Source,r.[RequestHelpFormVariant], r.[TargetGroups], r.AccessRestrictedByRole, r.RequestorDefinedByGroup, r.RequestsRequireApproval, r.SuppressRecipientPersonalDetails, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Website].[RequestHelpJourney] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Website].[RequestHelpJourney], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.[Source] = CT.[Source] where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ActivityID, CT.QuestionID, CT.RequestFormVariantID, r.[Order], r.[Required], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID and r.QuestionID = CT.QuestionID  and r.RequestFormVariantID = CT.RequestFormVariantID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.PostCode, r.DateRequested, r.IsFulfillable,r.CommunicationSent,r.ForRequestor,r.OtherDetails,r.PersonID_Recipient,r.PersonID_Requester,r.ReadPrivacyNotice,r.AcceptedTerms,r.SpecialCommunicationNeeds,r.CreatedByUserID, r.RequestorType, r.OrganisationName, r.Archive, r.[Guid], r.ReferringGroupId, r.RequestorDefinedByGroup, r.RequestType, r.Source, r.FulfillableStatus, r.SuppressRecipientPersonalDetail, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Request] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[Request], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.RequestId, r.FreqencyID, r.NumberOfRepeats, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[RequestSubmission] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[RequestSubmission], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.RequestId = CT.RequestId where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.requestId, r.ActivityID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[SupportActivities], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.RequestID = CT.RequestID and r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.RequestId, CT.JobId, CT.DateCreated, CT.FieldChanged,r.CreatedByUserID,r.OldValue,r.NewValue,
r.QuestionId, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[UpdateHistory] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Request].[UpdateHistory], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.RequestId = CT.RequestId and r.JobID = CT.JobId and r.DateCreated = CT.DateCreated and r.FieldChanged = CT.FieldChanged where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.PostalCode, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[ChampionPostcode] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[ChampionPostcode], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.UserID = CT.UserID and u.PostalCode=CT.PostalCode where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.RegistrationStep, u.DateCompleted, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[RegistrationHistory] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[RegistrationHistory], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.UserID = CT.UserID and u.RegistrationStep =CT.RegistrationStep where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.UserID, CT.ActivityID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[SupportActivity] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[SupportActivity], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.UserID = CT.UserID and u.ActivityID=CT.ActivityID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, u.FirebaseUID, u.PostalCode, u.EmailSharingConsent, u.MobileSharingConsent, u.OtherPhoneSharingConsent, u.HMSContactConsent, u.IsVolunteer, u.IsVerified, u.DateCreated, u.StreetChampionRoleUnderstood, u.SupportVolunteersByPhone, u.SupportRadiusMiles, u.ReferringGroupId,u.Source, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[User] u RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [User].[User], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on u.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value:
SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS}
SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT c.datestamp, c.userId, c.rememberMeId, c.verified, c.verificationDetails.dobMatch, c.verificationDetails.ageMatch, c.verificationDetails.notPreviouslyVerified,c.userUpdated 
from c 
where c._ts>1589372085

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select CT.[RequestHelpFormVariantID], CT.[SupportActivityID],a.[Label], a.[DisplayOrder], a.[IsPreSelected], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Website].[RegistrationFormSupportActivity] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN 
CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Website].[RegistrationFormSupportActivity], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on 
a.[RequestHelpFormVariantID] = CT.[RequestHelpFormVariantID] 
and a.[SupportActivityID] = CT.[SupportActivityID]
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}
